title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Olomouc, Czech Republic
description:
This year we will celebrate Global Day of Coderetreat for the first time in Olomouc, Czech Republic.  
  Join us for a full day of hands-on coding practice to improve your craft. 
  Bring your computer and your brain—we've got the rest covered!  
  RSVP and more information on http://srazy.info/coderetreat/5864
